entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight then light before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
